name: 灯織
text: （ふぅ。今日のレッスンはこんなところかな）
trans:
(Phew. That should be enough practice for today's
lesson.)

name: めぐる
text: わたしもレッスン終わったところだし、一緒に帰ろう！
trans:
Since I also just finished my lessons, how about we
both go home together!

name: 灯織
text: 一緒に帰るだけで、何でそんなに嬉しそうなの……
trans:
We're just going home together, why are you
that excited...?

name: めぐる
text:
えへへ～細かいことは気にしないでさ
さ、行こ行こ～っ！
trans:
Ehehe～ Don't worry about the details!
Let's go gooo～!

name: 灯織
text: （レッスン後なのに、元気な子……）
trans: (She's still full of energy after lessons...)

name: めぐる
text:
えー、灯織と一緒に帰れるんだから
楽しいに決まってるよー！
trans:
Ehh... Of course I'd have a fun time going home
with you!

name: めぐる
text:
それに、レッスンも一緒にできてね、
すっごく楽しかったよ！
trans:
Besides, having these lessons together
was sooo much fun!

name: めぐる
text:
そうだよ！
だからね、もっと灯織と仲良くなれたら嬉しいな！
trans:
That's right!
Which is why it'd be nice if we could get
closer, Hiori!

name: めぐる
text:
もーっと一緒にレッスンもしたいし……
そしたらダンスとか歌もきっとぴったりになるし……
trans:
And I want to have more lessons together with
you too... Then our dancing and singing will
also be in sync...

name: めぐる
text:
あっ、それにさ、レッスンたくさん一緒にやれば、
それだけたっくさん一緒に帰れるよねっ！
trans:
Oh, and if we do more lessons together, we'll
also be able to walk home together too!

name: めぐる
text:
えっへへ！
そう思うと、これからもすっごい楽しみだな～！
trans:
Ehehe!
Thinking about it just makes me look forward to it
more～!

name: めぐる
text:
あ、そうだ！
ここは友情のハグを――
trans:
Oh, right!
How about a friendship hug──

name: めぐる
text:
うぐ……
何で止めるの……
trans: Ugh... Why did you tell me to stop...

name: めぐる
text: ぶー。せっかく仲良くなれるチャンスだったのにー！
trans:
Boo. It was a good chance for us to become
closer friends!

name: 灯織
text: ……仲良くなるにしても、少しずつ、だから
trans:
...Even becoming closer to someone has to be
done step by step.

name: 灯織
trans: ...Come on, let's hurry and go home.
